content:
ASHISH GUPTA
Email:- ashiishg@outlook.com
+91-9999742978


Summary:- Having more than 6 + year of expertise in programming on Unix using C, Shell and on Oracle using Pro*c ,Oracle PL/SQL with hands on programming experience in Shell Scripting ,Oracle Development and PL/SQL. Clear Understanding of Pro*C with hands of Oracle on Unix. Experience in Database Administration, Unix Administration Troubleshooting and Debugging.

 TECHNICAL SUMMARY	

· Good Knowledge in UNIX, SQL,PLSQL
· Expertise Knowledge Data Pump (expdp & impdp).
· Expertise in writing SQL Loader.
· Expertise in Oracle Development.
· Expertise with SQL Statements (DML,DDL,DCL).
· Knowledge in creating Triggers, Procedures.
· Knowledge Exceptions and Error Handling.
· Knowledge on UNIX Shell scripting (bash, sh,).
· Knowledge in writing Sub queries.
· Knowledge in Shell Scripting.
· Knowledge in UNIX/Oracle Database.
· Good troubleshooting and debugging knowledge on Solaris/Unix Platform.
· Automation testing using shells scripting (using Crontab, At).


EMPLOYERS


 (
Page 
1
 of 3
)
1.  Employer -

Company	:	AurionPro Solution Designation	:	Sr. Software Engineer
Durations	:	Feb-17 to Jan-18



2. Previous Employer -

Company	:	E-Centric Solutions Designation	:	Software Developer Durations	:	August - 12 to Jan - 17

 PROJECTS	

1) Data Conversion and Loading

Role: Software Developer

Contribution:
· Written shell scripts using sed/awk for Extraction, Transformation and Loading of data using SQL*Loader from different heterogeneous source systems like Flat files, Excel, Oracle.
· Scheduled shell script for automatic run for backup/restore of different schema using exp/imp utility.
· Designed and developed UNIX scripts for creating, dropping tables which are used for scheduling the jobs.
· Wrote shell script for create reports on Oracle tables.
Environment

Operating System	:	Sun Solaris 10 
RDBMS	:	Oracle 11g
Language	:	C, SQL
Scripting	:	Shell
Tools	:	GCC,  SQL* Loader, imp/exp


2) WPI (Wholesale Price Index)

WPI is Internet based application and used to store and calculate the whole sale prices of the different-2 items manufactured by different-2 companies. In this application master data also upload by the user or by the company and use encryption at database label for security purpose.

3) ISSCDMS (Integrated System for Sick Companies   & Decision Monitoring System)

ISSCDMS is a intranet based Application in BIFR for storing the details of sick companies and manipulate data on different 2 scales. It have various modules such as cases registration, hearing schedule, case hearing details, special director registration & empanelment, general administration records monitoring, court cases etc. and various types of records.

4) Hospital Data Management System

Role: Application Developer
Scripting (UNIX, awk, sed), Oracle Developement

Description: Project involved creating automatic network oriented Hospital Data Management in VLAN environment. Along with web based reporting, backup, VLAN facilities.4

Contribution:
· Responsible for client/server programming using sockets on SOLARIS.
· Client will calculate Sm BIOS serial number and ip-address of hospital computer which is already assigned for this system and will pass it to Data server, Data server in turn communicates with ORACLE server’s tables to find doctor's actual timing and patient information which was stored at the registration time.
· Created different tables, cursors, procedures, triggers in Oracle schema. Added Oracle data guard along with Setup of Oracle RAC facility for disaster management in case of hardware or other failure. Written UNIX shell scripts for cold and hot backup using crontab.
· Wrote apache based cgi-programming using shell-scripting for reporting in internet browser.
· Other tasks included Solaris/oracle installation. Solaris security/network driver setup, oracle network setup and oracle tablespace / data files management. Created Backup and recovery plans using RMAN and crontab based scripting.

Environment
	Hardware
	:
	Intel Core i3, SunSparc Server

	Platforms
	:
	Sun Solaris 10, Windows 8, Linux Red hat

	RDBMS
	:
	Oracle 11g

	Language
	:
	C, Pro *C

	Scripting
	:
	Shell, PL/SQL,

	Tools
	:
	Make, Expect, CVS, SQL * Loader

	Other
	:
	VMware, Microsoft Excel

	
  TECHNICAL SKILLS	
	



	Skills
	Tools

	Scripting
	Shell scripting, Expect, Sed

	Programming Language
	C programming

	Markup Language
	CGI, HTML

	Database Languages
	SQL, PL/SQL, Pro*C

	Database
	Oracle 10g Database, Oracle 11g Database

	Operating System
	UNIX (Sun Solaris 5.10/5.11, Linux),Windows 7&8

	Utilities
	GCC, MAKE

	Backup
	Cp, Tar, Zip, Gunzip

	Database Backup
	RMAN full backup and incremental backup

	Other Tools
	Data Pump, DBCA, SQL*Loader, VMware

	Repository Tool
	CVS



 QUALIFICATION	

	Degree
	Institute
	Major/Specialization

	Uttar Pradesh Technical University
	Computer Applications

	BSc.
	Dr B R Ambedkar University
	Computer Science

	12th Class
	UP Board (Aligarh)
	Science and Mathematics

Ashish Pawar
Email   : ashishbpawar87@gmail.com
Mob No: 8087885945

Objective:
Seeking a challenging and responsible QlikView & Qlik sense Developer position where I can share my knowledge for the growth of an organization as well as an individual.
SUMMARY: -
· Around 5 years of experience in IT industry and 3 + years of experience in BI reporting tool QlikView and QlikSense. Extensively worked with QlikView Enterprise Edition to develop reports for analyzing purpose.
· Perform detailed analysis of source system data and model that data in QlikView / QlikSense.
· Good working experience on QlikView and QlikSense objects like List Box, Multi Box, Pivot Table, Straight Table, Bar Chart, Combo Chart, Line Chart etc.
·  Excellent user focused analytical, communication and presentation skills.
·  Gathering data sources like QVD files, Excel, Oracle, Binary QVW, and Inline in developing the QlikView/ QlikSense data model.
· Developed QlikView and QlikSense Dashboard using Chart Box (Drill Down, Drill up and cyclic grouping), List, Input Field, Table Box.
· Implemented section access and hidden scripting for the application security.
· Assigning CAL’s to user
· Worked on QlikView Server and NPrinting.
· Creating and scheduling PPT, Excel etc. reports by using NPrinting.

TECHNICAL SKILLS :-
Reporting Tools		: QlikView  v 11.2, 12.20, QlikSense
			  QlikView Server and Publisher, NPrinting, Power BI (Beginner)
Database		: MS SQL Server 2008, MS Access
Operating System	: Windows 98/2000/XP/7
EDUCATIONAL QUALIFICATION: -
· B. E. (Information Tech.) from Amravati University, in 2012 
· Diploma in Information Tech. MSBTE Mumbai 2009



EMPLOYMENT CHRONICLE: -
Bristlecone India, Mumbai.				(Jun’17-till Date) 
Project -MDW_Marazzo_Dashboard (U321)
Client - Mahindra and Mahindra Pune
Key Deliverables: 
· Designing the data model and development of dashboards and reports
· Designed and implemented proof of concepts
· Developed graphical user Interactive reports using various objects
· Good skills in data modeling (Star schema, Snowflake schema) 
·  Installation & configuration of QlikView software
· Implemented best practices & developed ETL scripts to resolve circular relationships, synthetic keys
· Involved in performance tuning & deployment of Qlik Sense and QlikView applications
· Loading data into Qlik Sense application from different QVDs and QVW applications (Binary Load)     and excel files
Project - MDW_Sales1-V4
Client   - Mahindra and Mahindra Kandivali Mumbai.
Key Deliverables: 
· Involved in implementing BI solution and reporting with the help of QlikView. 
· Formulated Business requirement document for various enhancement within the application.
· Worked with huge volume of data analyzing records sets for data validation.


Indoco Remedies Ltd.Mumbai                                    (Mar’15-May’17)
Officer MIS ( Qlikview Developer / Administrator )
Accomplishments: -
· Received recognition from Sr. Management for my contribution in streamlining system process.
Key Deliverables: - 
· Involved in application optimization and performance tuning.
· Preparation of detailed user requirements, process flows, Test cases and user Guides.
· Perform sheet level security using section access.
· Worked with huge volume of data analyzing records sets for data validation.
· Assigning Names CAL and Document CAL to users.
·  Generation of PPT and PDF reports through NPrinting and scheduling it for top management.

Indoco Navision BI Application
· Involved in implementing BI solution and reporting with the help of QlikView. 
· Formulated Business requirement document for various enhancement within the application.
· Worked with huge volume of data analyzing records sets for data validation.
· Worked on QlikView Server and Publisher.
Other Achievements
· Implemented automation of report scheduling on daily basis by using NPrinting.

S & S InfoTech Services Pvt. Ltd. Mumbai                                      May’2014-Feb’2015
BI Developer ( Qlikview Support / Administrator )
Project - Abbott sales Management
Client   - Abbott Health Care Pvt Ltd,Mulund Mumbai
· Understand the business requirements, analysis and translate into application and operational requirements. 
· Perform sheet level security using section access.
· Scheduling task in QMC.
· Assigning CAL to user.
· Handel QlikView Server and Publisher tasks.
· Performing testing, validation checks on the deliverables.
MISCELLANEOUS: -
Participated in National Level Paper Presentation on Cloud Computing.
Personal Details
Name			 Ashish B. Pawar
DOB			13 Oct’1987
Marital Status	 	Married 
Address			MSEB Colony, Sanjay Gandhi National Park, Borivali East, Mumbai.

content:
ASHISH KRISHAN  	 	                                  	 	 	 	 	 	    +91-8920321803
Application Development Associate                							        Date of Birth: 14/02/1995    
Accenture Solutions Pvt. Ltd.       								E-mail: ashishkrishan1995@gmail.com 
 
 EDUCATION 
 
	Year 
	Degree/Certificate 
	Institute/School, City 
	CGPA/ % 

	2014-2018 
	Bachelor of Technology 
	Amity School of Engineering and Technology, New Delhi 
	72.3/100 

	2013 
	Class XII: CBSE Board 
	Springdales School, New Delhi 
	79.80 

	2011 
	Class X:  CBSE Board 
	Springdales School, New Delhi 
	70.00 


 
WORK EXPERIENCE 	 
Accenture Solutions Pvt. Ltd. 
    Data Analytics Associate	                                                                                                                                           Period: Oct 2018 - Present 
· Working as a Tableau Developer with a pharmaceutical client. Working on building dashboards and stories on the data provided. 
· Using IBM DB2 for ETL processes and executing queries
· Trained in SQL, Tableau and Qlikview as part of Accenture Greenfield Training.  
 
CERTIFICATIONS 	 
 
AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner 
The AWS Cloud Practitioner exam enables individuals with an overall understanding of the AWS Cloud to validate their knowledge with an industry-recognized credential. It provides individuals in a larger variety of cloud and technology roles with a way to validate their AWS Cloud knowledge and enhance their professional credibility. 
 
Data Visualization with Tableau (Coursera) 
· Generated powerful reports and dashboards that will help people make decisions and take action based on their business data.  
· Worked with specific types of charts including scatter plots, Gantt charts, histograms, bullet charts and several others, and addressed charting guidelines.  
 
Machine Learning, Stanford University (Coursera) 
· Studied about Machine Learning, Data Mining and Statistical Pattern Recognition.  
· Topics broadly included Supervised Learning, Support Vector Machines, Kernels, Neural Networks, Unsupervised Learning, Computer Vision Variance Theory. 
· Developed an application for identifying and recognizing objects, words and digits in an image. 
 
Python for Data Analytics, University of Michigan (Coursera) 
· Studied about Python Data Structures, Regular Expressions, Networks and Sockets, JSON and REST. 
· Topics broadly included Python Programming for Web Data Scraping, Applying Machine Learning in Python, Applied Plotting, Charting and Data Representation and Applied Social Network Analysis. 
· Worked on the Capstone project to build a Search Engine and run a simple version of the Google PageRank Algorithm. Also, worked on spidering and modelling email data from the Sakai Open Source Project. 
 
 

ACADEMIC ACHIEVEMENTS: 	 
· Dr. JK Pal Memorial Best Student Award 2018 for outstanding contribution to IEEE student activities. 
· Selected to present my project on Detection of Lung Cancer at the IEEE Maker Fair 2017.  
· Outstanding Student Volunteer Award for exemplary contribution and dedication to IEEE and its activities for the academic year 2016-2017. 
· Invited as a speaker for Events Mosaic, a skill development initiative by Markitiers. Delivered a talk on UI/UX design patterns. 
  
 PROJECTS/SUMMER INTERNSHIPS: 	 
1. Institute: Defense Research and Development Organisation (DRDO), New Delhi 
Topic: Clustering of data using the OPTICS technique.                                                                          Period: June-July, 2017. 
· A java program that performs clustering of spatial data points (using OPTICS algorithm) in the given input database. 
· Analyzed the relative position of data points in order to perform clustering. 
· Obtained clusters were visualized using the Java Swing Library.  
 
2. Haar Cascade Classifier: 
· Developed a Haar Cascade Classifier for face, eyes and smile detection using python programming language. 
· Used the OpenCV library to design the classifier to identify Haar features. 
· Used WinSCP to train the classifier on an Ubuntu based server. The training was performed on 3000 negative images with the positive image superimposed on it. 
 
3. Lung Cancer Detection System: 
· Used Histogram Equalization, Thresholding and Filtration for image pre-processing and PCA method for feature extraction and dimensionality reduction. 
· DICOM dataset obtained from Kaggle was used to train and test the classifier. 
· Classification was performed by using an Artificial Neural Network, which accepts the entropy of image as an input value and performs classification. 
· Initially obtained an accuracy of 76% which got boosted to 84% by using ADA Boost algorithm.  
 
 
 TECHNICAL SKILLS 	 
· Programming Languages:  Python, Django, JAVA. 
· Tools: Tableau, Qlikview, IBM DB2. 
· Others: MySQL, HTML, CSS, JS. 
 
 POSITIONS OF RESPONSIBILITY & EXTRA CURRICULAR ACTIVITES 	 
· Design Lead, IEEE R10 SAC: Selected to work for IEEE Region 10 from the entire Asia Pacific Region. Responsible was designing posters, illustrations and logos for the various events and announcements of IEEE R10 SAC. 
· Chairperson, IEEE ASET:  Responsible for planning meetings and agenda in conjunction with other board members, provided leadership and ensured effective operation and implementation of the decisions made at the meetings. 
· Publications Coordinator, IEEE ASET: Responsible for all the publication work related to the club. This included the designing of graphics, illustrations, posters and logos.

points.text: Design Lead, IEEE R10 SAC: Selected to work for IEEE Region 10 from the entire Asia Pacific Region. Responsible was designing posters, illustrations and logos for the various events and announcements of IEEE R10 SAC
Used WinSCP to train the classifier on an Ubuntu based server. The training was performed on 3000 negative images with the positive image superimposed on it
Used the OpenCV library to design the classifier to identify Haar features

content:
Ashish Kumar Pandey
Mobile: +91 9454336613
E-mail: carrierhelp247@gmail.com

Objective:
Creative and innovative thinker with effective human resources management and goal setting abilities combined with superior leadership, team building, communication, interpersonal, and presentation skills.  Self-motivated with the ability to excel in a fast-paced environment; communicate effectively at all levels; manage competing priorities; and adapt readily to new challenges.

Summary:
· 1+ years in the entire gamut of functions involved in Recruitment for IT and Telecom Sectors looking out for Sr Role with oragnization repute.
· Currently associated with Wipro technologies as Technical Recruiter on C2H position since Feb 2019 to Till Date.
· Expertise in Sourcing, Screening of resumes, Initial screening, Interview co-ordination, HR Discussion, Salary Negotiation, follow-up, and Vendor Management 
· Exertise in Leadership Hiring, Bulk Hiring, Lateral Hiring.
· Skill-full in interacting with Managers, Vendors and Business Dept Heads.
· A team player with strong interpersonal skills and a can do attitude.
· Used social media outlets like LinkedIn and Facebook to collect perspective candidate from existing employee and their referral.
· Provided support to higher level management to participate in interactions, feedback and welcome candidate when they are hired.
· Enhanced and support employee through good referral package for full time positions available. Send reminder and current job opening list to in-house applicants.
· Updated and tracked candidates in accordance to company’s standards. 
· Submitted qualified candidates to open job requirements. 
· Effective in sourcing, networking, referralgenerating, relationshipbuilding, strongnegotiating and closing skills.
· Provided candidates in cross platform and corporated  business units
· Implemented full lifecycle of recruiting by sorting out the resume, taking technical screening, arranging telephonic interview, back ground and reference check etc.
· Delivering high quality candidate for interview resulting to save quality time and resource of Company.
· Sourced candidate like Project Manager, General Manager, Plant manage and Business Manager.
· Implemented recruiting campaigns to attract quality potential Consultants for contract, contract to hire and fulltime client requirements nationwide.
· Followed Companypolicies and procedures when utilizing Outlook& timely submission of qualified candidates for open requirements.
· Educate consultants, 3rdpartycandidates with Company policy, process of placement from resume preparation, interview, selection and hiring assessment.
· Utilised a variety of resources and individual initiative, source-qualified candidates for current open job orders and used LinkedIn tools.
· Initiated signed Purchase orders, Master contracts and Billing sheet on timely manner.
· Reviewed consultant's resume against a requirement and determine a good match.

Education:
· MBA (HR) From AKTU 2018	

Core Competencies:
· Talent Acquisition
· Salary Negotiations
· Onboarding
· Database Management
· Vendor Management
· HR Co-ordination
· HR Operations

Professional experience:

Wipro Technologies	Feb 2019 to Till Date
 Technical Recruiter (INDIA)	Noida
Wipro is the world’s largest provider of diversified business process services with leading capabilities in transaction processing, automation, analytics and constituent experience. 

We manage interactions with patients and the insured for a significant portion of the U.S. healthcare industry. We are the customer interface for large segments of the technology industry and the operational and processing partner of choice for public transportation systems around the world.

Roles &Responsibilities:
· Working on high volume requestionsand Executive Hiring.
· Extensively worked for CTI internal project for major positions like Blockchain,Data Science, ML, AI postions. 
· Sourcing the right profiles through job portals, employee referral, social media, networking, and headhunting.
· Recruiting and hiring all levels of staff(Engineers, Senior Engineer, Assistant Managers, Deputy Managers, Project Managers, Senior Managers, Service Delivery Managers, Department Heads)
· Strong experience in hiring for telecom domain requirements.
· Develop close partnership with the Talent acquisition leads to ensure recruitment is consistent with the business goals.
· Involved in internal Job postings, employee referrals, organizing and coordinating recruitment drives & maintaining recruitment trackers.
· Responsible for Offer discussion, negotiation and Offer generation.
· Involved in Pre Joining Formalities and New Hire On-Boarding process.
· Developing and maintaining open communication among management, vendor and candidates.
· Aggressive enough to close on positions & ensure the work is done within the SLA defined.
· Preparing MIS report & maintaining candidate’s database through Excel.

Human Resource Partner Activities (Roles and Responsibilities):-
· Consistent interaction with the Dept Heads to understand day to day business needs
· As a HRBP assisting the Senior HR Manager in administering employee connect programs internally and globally
· Working closely with the Senior HR Manager to maintain an updated employee database on a regular basis.
· Responsible for implementing various HR policies & procedures by aligning the Policy in accordance with the corporate business plan & the latest Industry Standards.
· Handling employee queries through emails, calls and personal meetings.
· Maintaining employee database and preparing MIS reports for Payroll processing.
· Preparing leave tracker and compiling attendance from different units such as Leaves, Absenteeism, and Late Coming for internal reporting and processing payroll and Updating of attendance & leaves, Salary processing on ERP.
· Responsible for providing Induction Programs and taking care of Joining & exit formalities.
· Processing employee referral bonus as well joining bonus.





TrueView HR Pvt Ltd	June 2018 to  Dec 2018
Technical Recruiter 	Greater Noida
Roles &Responsibilities:
· My prime responsibilities include sourcing, interviewing and hiring IT professionals for multiple projects and assignments in the IT services industry. 
· Good communication skills, people networking abilities, a good deal of aggression and customer orientation skills were key my success in the job..
· Extensively worked for Wipro, Verizon and other Clients.
· Maintained an efficient database, with the help of which I could successfully deliver right IT people in right time.
· Establish and manage relationships with recruitment vendors and third party agencies
· I worked with IT consultants of various experience levels on .Net, Java/J2ee, Oracle, SAP, People soft, data warehousing, mainframes, testing tools, etc.
· Analyzing requirements and searching profiles in the internal Database, personal database, mass e-mailing & on different job portals like Dice, Monster, Techfetch and CareerBuilder to source active and passive candidates for contract, and contract-to-hire positions.
· Follow up candidate’s status and check the availability of candidate for the phone interview and face to face interview and confirm the client about candidate availability.
· Provide the interview instructions, bridge or conference number, Interview timing, venue details and name of the interviewer to the candidates. 
· Proven skills in sourcing, interviewing, extending/closing offers, and negotiating compensation packages.
· Responsible for all phase of Recruitment process which includes identifying consultants, analyzing requirements and identifying the requirements on the basis of closure.
· Coordinated background checks and drug test process for the offered candidates. 
· Coordinated the paper work process after the candidate cleared the background checks and drug test.
· Updated the tracker in the day to day basis. Also attended meetings with team leader every week to discuss about the requirement and other things. 

Major Technologies Worked on IT domain
Microsoft Technologies: Dot Net, ASP.Net, VB, VB.Net, C #, Silverlight, WCF, WPF etc.
Languages: C, Embedded C,C++ on UNIX and Shell Scripting, C++ on Windows, data structure, multithreading, VC++, Perl, Python.
DBA: Oracle DBA, SQL DBA, DB2, DB2 Mainframe, DB2 UDB, Sybase DBA
Sun (Oracle) Technologies: J2EE Concepts, Core Java (Multi-threading, collection etc.), JSP, EJB, Build
Tools (Ant, Hudson, Maven), UML, Hibernate, spring, Struts, Ajax, Swing, Application Sever (Tomcat, Weblogic, Websphere), Web services (REST, SOAP etc.).
Data warehousing:Cognos BI, CognosTM1
Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP): SAP, Oracle apps, PeopleSoft
Infrastructure : Linux Admin, Solaris Admin, Windows Admin (Windows Exchange, Windows Active Directory,
Windows VMware),VMware Admin, Unix admin, Storage Admin, Wintel Admin, Web logic Admin, Web Sphere Admin, AIX Admin.
Testing: Automation Testing, Manual Testing, Automation Testing + Manual Testing, Performance Testing, QTP (Quick Test Professional), QC (Quality Center), Selenium.
ETL Tools: OBIEE Developer, Data stage Developer, Abnitio, Hyperion Planning, Hyperion-MDM, Hyperion-FDM, Web methods Developer.
Others: Technical support, UI Developer, Web Developer, Full Stack Web Developer, RPA Developer, ATG
Developer,AS400 Consultant, Forensics Specialist, Component Manager, Design Verifications Engineer, Crystal Report, SSRS (SQL Server Reporting Services), SSIS (SQL Server Integration Services), DOC1, Thunderhead, Extreme Dialogs, Production Support, Technical Writer, Scrum Master or Agile Expert, PHP Developer, Service desk etc.
Major Technologies Worked on Telecom domain
RAN-BSS Engineer, CS Core Engineer, PS Core Engineer, RF Engineer, Transmission Engineer, IP Engineer, IP Core Engineer, SOC Engineer, IP Planning Engineer, NOC Monitoring Engineer, Network Integration Engineer.

Personal Details:	
Date of Birth:20th March 1996
Gender	: Male
Marital Status: Unmarried
Languages Known :English, Hindi

Declaration:
I hereby declare that the above information is to the best of my knowledge and beliefs.

Date:
Greater Noida
